title: WHY AM I VSING CHALLENGERS AND IM ONLY PLAT 1
body: I just had a game where my team were Plats and the enemy team had Challenger or Former Challenger Players on it obvs got smashed cause of it why riot its actually unfair and im losing LP for it cause your matching system is broken

replies.body: I understand. I'm Bronze 5 0LP, and I am placed with Plats and Golds in my ranked games.
Ranked reset absolutely butchered everyone's MMR this season.
